build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm install && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: php -d upload_max_filesize=100M -d post_max_size=100M artisan migrate --force && php artisan db:seed --force && php artisan storage:link && php -d upload_max_filesize=100M -d post_max_size=100M -S 0.0.0.0:$PORT -t public
